summary: Business development professional with extensive experience in management and training, skilled at developing and executing marketing plans, budgeting, staff coaching, and improving operations.

experience.title: Business Development
experience.description: Developed startup budget of $500,000 for a new business; collaborated with business partners in the design and creation of the entire business concept; created logo, menus, designed advertisements, radio spots, flyers and cards for marketing the new business; created cost controls; interviewed, hired and trained the entire staff; maintained strong regular clientele; provided personal interaction with guests and assisted in guest recovery; served as Operations Lead in running daily operations with ongoing coaching of staff; managed financial aspects of the business; helped create marketing materials to grow the business; ensured compliance with state requirements and regulations including food safety guidelines and bar liquor license laws; led the management team; oversaw payroll and bookkeeping; created and maintained social media including ongoing website updates; set up and maintained an entertainment schedule, budget and promotional materials; implemented employee incentive programs; developed and executed guest loyalty programs; Purchasing Manager responsibilities included maintaining weekly inventory and oversight of weekly ordering; ran weekly meetings with chefs and partners to strategize and implement new ideas and programs; established and maintained cost controls and profit analysis; collaborated with national brands to brand their product with ours; partnered with major suppliers on rebate programs, contract negotiations and identifying cost savings; worked with major suppliers to determine plate cost to identify profitable and non profitable items and optimal menu placement.

experience.title: Purchasing Manager
experience.description: Maintained weekly inventory; oversaw weekly ordering of all food and supplies necessary to run the operations; ran weekly meetings with chefs and partners to strategize and implement new ideas and programs; established and maintained cost controls and profit analysis; collaborated with national brands to help brand their product with ours; teamed up with national brands to promote events with POS materials, giveaways and specials; partnered with major suppliers on rebate programs, contract negotiations and identifying cost savings; worked with major suppliers to determine plate costs to identify profitable and non profitable items and menu placement.

experience.title: Business Management
experience.description: Led management team; developed guest loyalty programs; developed guest satisfaction procedures; developed and implemented policy and procedure manuals; created recipe guides and plating procedures for 14 units to maintain consistency; created all print and marketing materials; created and maintained social media and website changes; Corporate Trainer: led in training, motivating, and coaching of over 1000 staff members; helped others to see the potential in themselves and to take the steps necessary to advance in the company; developed training manuals; developed job descriptions for every position within the company; worked with chefs to create recipes and specials to keep things fresh while maintaining cost controls; Retail Product Development: helped develop retail product packaging and labels; worked with food processing authorities to establish shelf stability, ingredient and nutritional information for labels; worked with retailers to establish brand in the market; met with national buyers to sell products; developed promotional and sales programs; created POS material; presented annual deals and purchase incentives; set up co-marketing with national brands; participated in product demos; took product to national food shows; represented product in national cooking competitions.
